duties_responsibilities.duty: Operate and maintain all production, test, and development systems in Windows and Linux environments.

Perform system administration activities including account management, monitoring/management of system resources, back-up/recovery, continuity of operations, security, managing operating systems, and storage management.
Perform administrative functions in AWS and respond to ATO requirements.
Install Operating Systems, upgrades/patches, and address security and information assurance requirements.
Assist with creating and maintaining documentation to support the testing, installation, operations, and maintenance of data center equipment.
Support basic Active Directory tasks including maintaining users and groups.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Information Technology, Computer Science, or a related field (Master's preferred)
